data.title: Technical University of Ostrava
data.meta_description: Technical University of Ostrava is the oldest and most well known technical university in Europe. According to the QS World University Rankings for Engineering â€“ Civil and Structural, Mechanical and Electrical Engineering majors are ranked within top 200 globally. The university maintains a long-term traditions and high-quality education for both international and local students from more than 30 countries over the world.
data.text:
Why to study in Technical University of Ostrava?

TUO's study programmes are built on a 170-year tradition. Currently there are over eleven thousand undergraduates and graduates studying for degrees at Bachelor's, Master's and PhD levels in engineering, IT, technology, economics and business administration. TUO follows the standard European Bologna Declaration and the European Credit Transfer System. This allows for ease of mobility for students via credit recognition.

4.000 EUR

What to study in Technical University of Ostrava?

We constantly develop our campus to ensure a quality environment for our students, with new and renovated buildings, research centres, laboratories, and comfortable classrooms.
